import React, { Component } from "react"; import { MDBCarousel, MDBCarouselCaption, MDBCarouselInner, MDBCarouselItem, MDBView, MDBMask, MDBContainer, MDBBtn, MDBIcon, } from "mdbreact"; import { getAideFromDB } from "../actions/aideActionCreator"; import { getUser} from "../actions/auth" import Navbar from "./navbar"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; export class Accueil extends Component { componentDidMount() { this.props.getAideFromDB(); this.props. getUser() } render() { console.log("taw",this.props.user) return (
{/**** * *****carousel *********/}

Strong mask

Slight Mast

Third text
{/************ * les filtres ***************/}
{/* ***********cards *******************/}
{this.props.aides.map((el) => (


{el.nom_prenom}

Plus de détails

{el.age}

{el.ville}

{el.exp}

Réserver
))}
); } } const mapStateToProps = (state) => { return { aides: state.aides, user:state. auth.user }; }; export default connect(mapStateToProps, { getAideFromDB, getUser })(Accueil);
